codedoc.description: Will inject the optimized svg contents in this place. SVG's can be added in the assets/svg folder. For an overview of which SVG's are available and their corresponding names: visit the styleguide.
codedoc.caption: Example use of the svg tag

codedoc.description: Will output the property data in a debug block. Useful to see what data is available for you to use in the template. If a property is omitted it will print out the current context.
codedoc.sample:
{% debug %}
{# -- or -- #}
 {% debug 'project' %}
codedoc.caption: Example use of the debug tag

build.info: used to store the compiled project

source.info: contains everything needed to build the project from scratch
